Oct 2018 to June 2022 CORTEC Middle East LLC
Position: Regional Manager – VPCI
Managing sales operations of the VPCI Business Team across the GCC to provide material & services for a variety of market segments including Oil & Gas, Power & Water, Military, Aviation, and Manufacturing
Dedicated focus on promoting turnkey solutions for the Oil & Gas Industry involving Preservation of Assets and Corrosion Protection
Spearheaded the development of innovative integrated solutions for the steel industry providing cost efficient processes for rust removal as well as prolonged corrosion resistance.
Job highlights:
Support & Supervision for the Sales Team
Distribution Management
Budget setting & resource allocation
Support on the creation & implementation of new CRM system.
Nov 2013 to Oct 2018 WACKER Chemicals Middle East FZE
Position: Regional Sales Manager MEA – Engineering Silicones
Managing sales operations of the Engineering Silicones Business Team throughout the Middle East and Africa to supply raw materials for a variety of market segments including General Industry, Energy, Automotive, and Healthcare.
Dedicated focus on Energy segment (Transmission & Distribution) since January 2015.
Job highlights:
Developing and implementing regional business development plans
Close coordination with Marketing Managers and Technical Managers of each market segment to drive and support sales operations throughout different channels to meet regional targets.
Conducting regular business trips to visit customers and perform presentations to provide on-site support for customer development projects.
Supporting promotional programs including Distributor Trainings, Conferences, and Trade Shows.
Monitoring the fulfilment of plans, and compiling deviation analyses.
Aug 2008 to Nov 2013 CORTEC Middle East LLC
Position: Business Development Manager – MCI
Succeeded in getting CORTEC products approved and specified by consultants and authorities.
Expanded market share as well as client data base.
Participated with the MIDDLE EAST DURABILITY RESEARCH CONSORTIUM on the research project “Evaluation of Service Life of Reinforced Concrete in The Middle East”.
Job highlights:
Manage sales team and support distributors within the GCC to meet sales goals and overall quality of service.
Conduct sales and marketing calls to book meetings with potential clients and key decision makers to facilitate new and existing business.
Prepare personalized technical submittal files to meet the client/project requirements.
Prepare and perform client presentations & training seminars articulating the value proposition of product, solution, and service offerings.
Provide management with suggestions for improving volume, market share and price levels.
Support other promotional programs including Technical Research, Conferences, and Trade Shows.
Dec 2007 to May 2008 Canning Industries Co Ltd (Sayegh Group)
Position: Production & Planning Manager
Re- implemented proper production planning techniques; recruited and trained staff; developed work procedures for operations & quality control & MRP.
Job highlights:
Handle the planning of all five production divisions
Handle the management of all production & assembly processes.
Manage & motivate a team of 200 personnel.
Sept 2004 to Dec 2007 Mix Technical Coatings Co (Petra Group)
Position: Operations Manager
Supervised the installation & commissioning of a new factory; recruited and trained staff; developed departments, work methods and procedures for operations & quality control; designed Excel based software for production costing, material estimation, inventory, accounting and sales; established groomed client and supplier relationships.
Job highlights:
Supervise chemical pre-treatment as well as all powder & PVDF coating production jobs.
Manage, motivate, and train a team of 20 personnel.
Handle purchase of all raw materials required for production.
Research new processes to implement in future expansion.
Nov 2006 to Feb 2007 Petra Aluminium Co (Expansion Project in Jordan)
Position: Owner Representative – Project Manager
The project consists of two major factories consisting of eight steel structure hangers in total (for glass, aluminum & steel fabrication, and coatings), and two management buildings with a total area of 30,000 m².
Job highlights:
Analyzing and comparing tender documents, quotations, bills of quantities, and specifications.
Supervising and following up on the civil contractor, steel structure contractor, and the consultant’s supervisory & design staff.
Coordinating with all production departments to set the appropriate layout for machines, offices, and utilities.
Coordinating with the electromechanical contactor on all the related requirements of the setup.
COMMENT
An experienced Chemical Engineer with broad industrial exposure to Operations Management, Production Management, Business Development, & Sales Management within the Middle East, GCC, & Africa – alternating between roles on client, distributor, and manufacturer sides. Aiming to deploy his skills and expand his area of expertise with a professional team.
Computer Skills: SAP - CRM, MS Dynamics 365 - CRM, MS Office, and Life-365™.
